```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)        

```

```{r}
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

## Pairs Plot
```{r}
# create a pairs plot
GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)

# create scatterplot
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) + geom_point()

# create histogram
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat)) + geom_histogram()
```
